name: SB Post Widget
author: SB Team

sections.description:
SB Post Widget is a plugin that allows to show custom post on sidebar. You can select the widget options to display custom information of post.

Required Plugin

  • SB Core

Features

  • Get post by many types: random posts, recent posts, post by category,…
  • Allow to display post date, post author, post excerpt,…
  • Custom size for post thumbnail.

Translations

  • English
  • Vietnamese

Recommended WordPress Plugins

  • SB Banner Widget
  • SB Clean
  • SB Comment
  • SB Login Page
  • SB Paginate
  • SB Tab Widget
  • SB TBFA
sections.installation:
Install this plugin from your WordPress site Dashboard or follow these steps below:

  1. Download plugin from WordPress Plugins directory and extract it.
  2. Upload the sb-post-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the SB Post Widget plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Go to the dashboard and access widgets page, drag and drop SB Post into the widget area where you want the list posts to be displayed.
sections.faq: Please visit homepage for more details.
sections.changelog:
1.0.9

Stop using SB Plugins if current theme doesn’t support.

1.0.8

  • Tested up to WordPress 4.1 version.
  • Re-struct SB Post Widget
  • Add screenshots.

1.0.7

Update functions to show post title with exact length.

1.0.6

Update new check core functions.

1.0.5

  • Check if blog supports post views, post likes and favorite posts.
  • Support custom post widget on widget.

1.0.4

Update check core function.

1.0.3

Update new check core functions.

1.0.2

Update: Update new admin folder.

1.0.1

Update: Move the post thumbnail function from SB Core class to SB Post class.

1.0.0

First release of SB Post Widget.
